classSpec.desc: groups elements which may appear within or between paragraph-like components of spoken texts.
comprende gli elementi a livello di componente specifici dei testi parlati
agrupa los elementos que aparecen a nivel de componente espec√≠ficamente en los textos dialogados.

remarks.p: This class is a subclass of both model.divPart and model.phrase, since its members can appear both between and within paragraph-like items such as utterances. It is not a subclass of model.inter, since this would prevent other phrase level elements from including the members of this class.
